SELECT record.*, hybrid.name as hybrid_name, plant.code as plant_code, plant.code_one as plant_code_one, plant.code_two as plant_code_two FROM os_plant_record as record, os_hybrid as hybrid, os_plant as plant WHERE record.hybrid_id = hybrid.id AND record.plant_id = plant.id
AND (plant.id = #{plantId} OR plant.parent_id = #{plantId} OR (plant.id IN (SELECT plant2.parent_id from os_plant as plant2 WHERE plant2.id = #{plantId})))
AND plant.id = #{plantId}
ORDER BY record.create_time DESC
